title: TanStack Query Modules — REST-Only Endpoints
description: While the majority of NasNetConnect uses Apollo Client for GraphQL, there are three specialized domains that communicate with REST-only endpoints and require TanStack Query (React Query) instead: batch jobs, OUI/MAC vendor lookups, and connection testing. This document covers each module, their caching strategies, and when to use them.
